Package rpg

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Capacity
    Interface representing a capacity (action) of the player
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Action
    Class representing an action of a character : use of an item or use of a capacity
    Armor
    Class representing an armor : defensive item
    Attack
    Class representing a physical attack
    Character
    Character class : Represents a character of the game
    Edible
    Class representing an edible item (Consommable) Can represent a health potion for instance
    Effect
    Class representing the effect of an item or a capacity
    Event
    Class representing an event of the game
    Fight
    Class fight : special event
    Heal
    Class representing a spell of healing
    Item
    Item class : represents an item / object of the game
    Main
    Main class
    Parry
    Class representing a capacity of defense (parry)
    Round  
    RPG
    Main class executable
    Scenario
    Class scenario representing an event without a fight, i.e where the characters can find items, etc ..
    Weapon
    Represents a weapon
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Ability
    Enum representing all the abilities
